alert.note: Alert for Mayes (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 4:56PM CDT until June 09 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Mayes County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 456 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles southeast of Hoot Owl, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Salina... Spavinaw... Spavinaw State Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
